author: IGN
description:
Check out the 3rd Anniversary Trailer for Goddess of Victory: Nikke, a third-person action RPG developed by Shift Up. The anniversary introduces three characters: Nayuta, Liberalio, and Chime. The anniversary also includes new boss fights, a new Union Raid, Solo Raid, and various limited-time mini-games and events. The 3rd Anniversary story event begins on October 30!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Official 'Goddess Fall' 3rd Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
What's the best PS2 game of all time? For the PS2’s 25th anniversary, we’re looking back at the games that made this console truly iconic. These are the games that pushed the technological and cultural boundaries of the era, becoming unforgettable experiences that still hold up today. From toe-tapping jam sessions to city-crossing crime epics, these are the 25 best PlayStation 2 games.

00:00 - Intro
00:52 - Guitar Hero 3
01:33 - Spider-Man 2
02:33 - Soul Calibur 2
03:08 - Persona 3 FES
03:55 - Kingdom Hears 2
04:44 - Timesplitters 2
05:20 - Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
05:54 - Jak 2: Renegade
06:51 - ICO
07:32 - Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3
08:19 - Burnout 3: Takedown
08:47 - Prince of Persia: Sands of Time
09:26 - Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening
10:01 - Katamari Damacy
10:41 - Bully
11:17 - God of War 2
11:55 - Okami
12:32 - Gran Turismo 3: A-Spec
13:23 - Final Fantasy 10
14:13 - Silent Hill 2
15:05 - Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
15:51 - Resident Evil 4
16:28 - Number 3
17
title: The Top 25 Best PS2 Games of All Time

author: IGN
description:
Check out the full episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG1S8EI8XoQ

In this week’s episode of Nintendo Voice Chat, the crew checks out Ball x Pit, the chaotic brick-breaking, ball-fusing roguelite that’s now available on Switch 2, Xbox, and Game Pass. They share first impressions of its fast-paced gameplay, clever base-building system, and addictive upgrade loop, and debate whether it’s one of 2025’s best new indies for Nintendo fans.

#BallxPit #NintendoSwitch2 #gaming
title: We’re All Hooked on Ball x Pit! - NVC Clips
